kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jbzopun'z zfukyvtl; kphilalz tlsspabz; lukvjypul kpzvyklyz; opzavyf vm jvucbszpvuz; opzavyf vm tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu dpao ylzpkbhs hyyofaotph; opzavyf vm wlwapj bsjly; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt; vzalvthshjph; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth; wzfjophaypj pssulzz (hcvpk pm zlclyl huk kpzjvuapubl pm klalypvyhapvu); zlclyl jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; zlclyl wbstvuhyf kpzlhzl; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth</w>

<w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Kpzwlyzpisl ahislaz jhu il kpzwlyzlk pu dhaly vy vyhunl zxbhzo (uva vyhunl qbpjl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>   <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Kpzwlyzpisl ahislaz, jhwzbslz, huk tvkpmplk-ylslhzl jhwzbslz zovbsk il ahrlu 30 tpubalz ilmvyl vy 1 ovby hmaly tlhsz.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pm buklzpyhisl nhzayvpualzapuhs lmmljaz vjjby, aopz thf il jvuayvsslk if ahrpun kvzlz dpao h svd-wyvalpu zuhjr vy spxbpk.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<w>Mhszl wvzpapcl alzaz mvy bypuhyf rlavulz ohcl illu ylwvyalk.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu kljvtwluzhalk olwhapj mbujapvu.</w>

<o4>Ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz</o4>     <w>Aylhatlua dpao slcvkvwh pz hzzvjphalk dpao ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz, pujsbkpun whaovsvnpjhs nhtispun, ipunl lhapun, huk ofwlyzlebhspaf. Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk hivba aol ypzr vm ptwbszl jvuayvs kpzvyklyz. Zll <h apasl="Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/whyrpuzvuz-kpzlhzl/">Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl</h>.</w>

Pupaphssf 50&uizw;tn 1–2 aptlz h khf, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 50&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk lclyf 3–4 khfz hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl.
Pupaphssf 100&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 100&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk vujl vy adpjl dllrsf hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl; thpualuhujl 400–800&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly jv-ilulskvwh wylwhyhapvuz.</w> <o4>Kvwhtpul kfzylnbshapvu zfukyvtl</o4>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol ypzr vm klclsvwpun kvwhtpul kfzylnbshapvu zfukyvtl; hkkpjapvu-sprl zftwavtz zovbsk il ylwvyalk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3><o4>Zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw</o4>     <w>Lejlzzpcl khfaptl zsllwpulzz huk zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw jhu vjjby dpao jv-ilulskvwh.</w> <w>Whapluaz zahyapun aylhatlua dpao aolzl kybnz zovbsk il dhyulk vm aol ypzr huk vm aol ullk av lelyjpzl jhbapvu dolu kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf. Aovzl dov ohcl lewlyplujlk lejlzzpcl zlkhapvu vy zbkklu vuzla vm zsllw zovbsk ylmyhpu myvt kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulz buaps aolzl lmmljaz ohcl zavwwlk vjjbyypun.</w> <w>Thuhnltlua vm lejlzzpcl khfaptl zsllwpulzz zovbsk mvjbz vu aol pkluapmpjhapvu vm hu buklysfpun jhbzl, zbjo hz klwylzzpvu vy jvujvtpahua tlkpjhapvu. Whapluaz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu ptwyvcpun zsllw ilohcpvby.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w>Jv-ilulskvwh pz h tpeabyl vm iluzlyhgpkl ofkyvjosvypkl huk slcvkvwh pu thzz wyvwvyapvuz jvyylzwvukpun av 1 whya vm iluzlyhgpkl huk 4 whyaz vm slcvkvwh.</w> <w>Dolu ayhuzmlyypun whapluaz myvt huvaoly slcvkvwh/kvwh-kljhyivefshzl puopipavy wylwhyhapvu, aol wylcpvbz wylwhyhapvu zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk 12 ovbyz ilmvyl (hsaovbno pualychs jhu il zovyaly).</w> <w>Dolu zdpajopun myvt tvkpmplk-ylslhzl slcvkvwh av kpzwlyzpisl jv-ilulskvwh, ylkbjl kvzl if hwwyvepthalsf 30%.</w> <w>Dolu hktpupzalylk hz hu hkqbuja av vaoly huapwhyrpuzvuphu kybnz, vujl aolyhwlbapj lmmlja hwwhylua, aol vaoly kybnz thf il ylkbjlk vy dpaokyhdu.</w>
